description.plain:
Robin Schulz is a German DJ and producer. Born in 1987, his first single, a remix of Mr. Probz’s Waves, was hugely successful, hitting number one overall on ten singles charts, and number one on other charts such as airplay and digital sales in even more. It also hit fourteen in the US.

His second single, a remix of Lillywood & The Prick’s single Prayer In C was even more successful, hitting number one in twenty countries. The third single, Willst Du was less successful, reaching the top fifty in only four countries. However, the fourth single, Sun Goes Down was much more successful, reaching number two in Germany, and hitting the top ten in six other countries.

His first album Prayer was released on September 19, 2014 and hit the top ten in three countries. It currently has a rating of 4.7/5 on Amazon.

body.plain:
Robin Schulz is a German DJ and producer. Born in 1987, his first single, a remix of Mr. Probz’s Waves, was hugely successful, hitting number one overall on ten singles charts, and number one on other charts such as airplay and digital sales in even more. It also hit fourteen in the US.

His second single, a remix of Lillywood & The Prick’s single Prayer In C was even more successful, hitting number one in twenty countries. The third single, Willst Du was less successful, reaching the top fifty in only four countries. However, the fourth single, Sun Goes Down was much more successful, reaching number two in Germany, and hitting the top ten in six other countries.

His first album Prayer was released on September 19, 2014 and hit the top ten in three countries. It currently has a rating of 4.7/5 on Amazon.

songs.full_title: OK by Robin Schulz (Ft. James Blunt)
songs.title: OK

description.plain:
In his usual fashion, Schulz takes listeners on a cheerful cruise through a mellow house soundscape, rife with pianos and bursts of synths that unfold nicely across its development.

James Blunt adds a relatable, introspective twist to the piece with impassioned vocals that constantly question whether everything is truly going to be “OK” with the subject of his verses.

songs.full_title: Sugar by Robin Schulz (Ft. Francesco Yates)
songs.title: Sugar

description.plain:
“Sugar” admires a girl by describing character traits the singer finds interesting – eg. her appearance, badass vibes and her sexiness.

Its chorus and parts of the beat are based on “Suga Suga” by Baby Bash.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6rgStv12dwA

This song is Robin Schulz' second single in 2015 and was released on the 17th July (2015).

songs.full_title: Show Me Love by Robin Schulz (Ft. Richard Judge)
songs.title: Show Me Love

description.plain: Track off Robin Schulz’s sophomore album Sugar named after its lead single of the same name, released 25th September 2015.

body.plain: Track off Robin Schulz’s sophomore album Sugar named after its lead single of the same name, released 25th September 2015.

songs.lyrics:
18 ContributorsShow Me Love Lyrics[Verse 1]
There’s a notebook on the table
You can take it to the store
So you won’t forget the groceries anymore
There’s a rifle in the cabinet that I used to fight a war
But to this day, I don’t know what I was fighting for
I’m fighting for

[Chorus]
Will you show me love as we get older
And I’m falling at your feet
After 30 years of service and the wounds of it are me
Show me love as we grow colder
Let our love provide the heat
That our older bones are missing
But our hearts will never need
[Verse 2]
There’s a blanket on the sofa that I used to keep you warm
When I find you fast asleep at half past four
There’s a record we keep turning that reminds us of our youth
But there’s still nothing as beautiful as you

[Chorus]
Will you show me love as we get older
And I’m falling at your feet
After 30 years of service and the wounds of it are me
Show me love as we grow colder
Let our love provide the heat
That our older bones are missing
But our hearts will never need

[Bridge]
As we grow colder
Love provide the heat
Older bones are missing
Hearts will never meet
Because your hand belongs in my hand
Belongs in your hand, belongs with, with me
(Blanket on the sofa that I used to keep you warm
There’s a record we keep turning that I used to turn you on)

[Chorus]
Show me love as we get older
And I’m falling at your feet
After 30 years of service and the wounds of it are me
Show me love as we grow colder
Let our love provide the heat
That our older bones are missing
